resources.string: Feel better with daily reflections, healthy habits & quality time.
Daily reflection for a better self
Look back, note down your daily feelings & find out the path to happiness.\n\nSee the correlation of your feelings with the rest of your daily activities.
Habits like exercising & reading are important in your wellbeing.\n\nCreate and keep up your healthy habits with customizable goals & reminders.
Quality time: take care of yourself
Balance your life alone & with those you care by spending mindful quality time with them.
